com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.core

Class ExternalTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.core.ExternalTask

  • public abstract class ExternalTask
extends Object
    Used to bridge asynchronous execution to external asynchronous APIs or events. doExecute(ExternalTaskCompletionHandle) method is expected to initiate call to an external API and return without blocking. Then completion or failure of the external task is reported through ExternalTaskCompletionHandle. A cancellation handler returned by the doExecute is used to report cancellation of the external task.
